properties.media:imagetext:
*CHAMPAGNE POMMERY,
75 CL
CHAMPAGNE POMMERY,
CUVEE LOUISE POMMERY 1981.
The "Cuvée" Louise Pommery was created as a tri-
bute to Louise Pommery, the lady who, by her love
of natural elegance, ushered the first "Champagne
Brut" into the world in 1874.
Louise Pommery, who had a lively, inventive
mind, had the idea of serving to some of her closest
friends a Champagne which was made without any
addition of sugar. She, herself, approved of this
new style of wine, which she found pleasant and
attractive.
Loyal to 1s ouncidies or cuat n te blending
of vintage wines, Pommery prepares the "Cuvée"
Louise Pommery with wines from a single, excep-
In line with the traditional Pommery taste, the
"Cuvée" Louise Pommery has an attractively sharp
nose, a aiscreet aroma or enardonnay and on the
palate it is smooth, fresh and balanced with a long,
light after-taste.
The unique character of the "Cuvée" lies in its
exceptional harmony and clarity, the exquisite
quality of the bouquet and the flavor.
CHARDONNAY
ROBERT MONDAVI WINERY
ROBERT MONDAVI CHARDONNAY 1982.
All the grapes which went into this wine were
grown in Napa Valley, California. After fermenta-
tion, the wine was aged for 10 months in French
oak barrels, which contributed roundness and
finesse to the final blend.
This 1982 Chardonnay combines intense fruiti-
ness with depth and complexity. It is a wine of both
crispness and charm, which will complement a
large number of entrées.
ESTATE BOTTLED
MISE DU CHATEAU
CHATEAU DE MEURSAULT
APPELLATION MEURSAULT CONTROLE:
SOCIÉTÉ CIVILE DU
DOMAINE
DU CHATEAU DE MEURSAULT
CHATEAU DE MEURSAULT 1984.
Chardonnay and Pinot Noir grapes give in Côte-
d'Or the greatest wines of Burgundy and Meur-
sault. The Château de Meursault 1984 has a golden
green color and is brilliant and clear. This wine is
very frank in taste and has a slight aroma of nuts.
GRAND CRU CLASSE
1982
CHATE AV
SMITH HAVT LAFITE
GRAVES
APPELLATION GRAVES CONTROLÉE
75 cl
MIS EN BOUTEILLE AU CHATEAU
Graves is known chiefly for its pleasant white
wines, but it also produces some outstanding reds.
Smith Haut Lafitte 1982 is distinctly Graves and
embodies the finest characteristics of the region.
It Is an elegant wine with a deep color and a
fine bouquet, which recalls the aroma of fruit with
hints of oakwood.
Poseph Drouhin
VOSNE-ROMANÉE
APPELLATION CONTROLEE
JOSEPH DROÜHIN
AUX CELLIERS DES ROIS DE PRANCE IT DES DUCS DE BOURGOGNE
75 cl
VOSNE-ROMANEE 1984 & 1985.
Issued from vineyards located around the famous
village of Vosne Romanée, this wine is a typical ex-
ample of Burgundy. Full of elegance and complex-
ity, and reminiscent of mushrooms and truffles.
When our stock of the 1984 vintage is exhausted,
it will be succeeded by the equally elegant and fine
wine from 1985.
WHISKY.
"A good whisky should have a pleasant aroma of
peat, flowers and alcohol which comes off espe-
cially in a warmed glass", notes the well known
connoisseur R.J.S. McDowall in, "The Whiskies
of Scotland".
Aside from Scotch whiskies there are three
other major types: American, Canadian and Irish.
Regardless
of its origins, whisky knows no
boundaries. It's truly cosmopolitan and enjoyed
by people the world over.
It leaves no one indifferent. It enjoys a love and
hate, take it or leave it relationship.
Those who didn't know what to look for in a
line whisky have been converted after learning
what to appreciate in a fine malt or blend.
We are proud to present a sophisticated selec-
tion of high quality whiskies. Of them all, Royal
Salute, which has been aged for 21 years, is prob-
ably the most appreciated.
But since one's relationship to whisky is a very
delicate matter, not to say intimate, we leave the
final decision up to you. So whatever you choose,
we are happy to serve tne very best. koyal Dalute
Chivas Regal, Glenlivet, Seagram's V.O., and Jack
Daniel's Black Label.
OTHER DRINKS AND CORDIALS
COCKTAILS
SHERRY:
Don Zoilo Fino
GIN:
Tanqueray
VODKA:
Absolut
COGNAC:
Renault X.O.
LIQUEURS:
Cherry Heering,
Drambuie,
Cointreau, Grand Marnier
PORT:
Quinta do Noval (10 years old)
